text: Guruhe az asrof va ʙuzurgoni qavmas, ki kufr varzida ʙudand va didori oxiratro duruƣ meangostand va dar zindagii dunjo ʙa onon ne'matu osois doda ʙudem, guftand: «In [mard kase] nest, magar ʙasare hamcun sumo. Az on ci [sumo] mexured, [u niz] mexurad va az on ci ki sumo menused, [u niz] menusad [pas, ʙartarie nadorad, ki pajomʙar ʙosad]
